message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $2000000. It's a unique opportunity and I believe it will be highly valuable to you. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your interest in selling the product to me, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a great deal, and I appreciate your offer. However, $1500000 is significantly below what this product is worth. I'm willing to come down to $1750000. This is a fair price considering the value I know this product will bring to you. Let's see if we can make this work.

I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but I'm still not convinced that $1750000 is the best deal. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I think $1625000 is a more reasonable price for this product. Let's see if we can meet somewhere in the middle.
